scene.name: Writing setup
scene.description: A desk with a pen (capped) and a blank sheet of paper

task.name: Write specific text
task.description: Uncap, write 'beingbeyond', and return pen to original state
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice writing. The goal is to uncap the pen, write 'beingbeyond', and return the pen to its original position.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要进行写字任务。目标是拔开笔盖，写下“beingbeyond”，然后把笔放回原位。

subtasks.description: Execute the writing sequence and reset
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please perform the writing sequence.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请执行连贯的书写流程。

steps.description: Remove the cap from the pen
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the pen and remove the cap.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：拿起笔，拔掉笔盖。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: write 'beingbeyond' on the paper.

steps.description: Recap the pen and return it to the original position
steps.spoken_prompt: Step three: put the cap back on and place the pen back to its original position.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第三步：把笔盖盖回去，并将笔放回原位。

constraints.notes: Ensure 'beingbeyond' is legible; verify the pen is capped and returned to the exact starting location.
